instructions: In iOS 7 or higher, swipe up from the bottom of the screen to reveal Control Center . The icon at the far left the lock and arrow icon is highlighted to indicate that it's turned on. Tap lock and arrow icon to turn off rotation lock. When you're done, press the home button or swipe to close Control Center and you'll be back to your home screen.
Tap Settings . Tap Display & Brightness . Tap View in the Display Zoom section. Tap Standard . Tap Set . The phone will restart in the new zoom setting and the home screen will be able to rotate.
